---
title: "Quiz 1"
---

Quiz 1 covers materials from Classes 1-14 of the course, as well as Jeff Leek's [How to be a modern scientist](https://leanpub.com/modernscientist), and other sources assigned during classes 1-14.

By noon on Friday 2025-02-28, several elements related to Quiz 1 will be provided to you.

1. The main document (pdf) for Quiz 1, which will include both instructions and all of the questions.
2. A link to the Google Form Answer Sheet for Quiz 1, where you will submit your responses.
3. Download information for the Data Sets we will provide for Quiz 1.

Quiz 1 is due on Wednesday 2025-03-05 at Noon.

## Pre-Release Information

1. A reasonably complete draft of the [Quiz 1 instructions](quiz1/432-quiz1-2025_instructionsonly.pdf) (pdf file) is now available, if you'd like to look at it. 
2. If you have a question prior to the release of Quiz 1 about the Quiz, send your question by email to Dr. Love at `thomas dot love at case dot edu`.
